meta_data.head: The Dinosaur Hunter

meta_data.description:
(See Cover) George Wilcken Romney, at 51, is a broad-shouldered, Bible-quoting broth 
of a man who burns brightly with the fire of missionary zeal. On the 
Lord's Day, and whenever else he can...
